comment._content: Lorlys Elton Rogers, New York Lawyer, center of a scandal involving a mistress who poisoned herself and their two children. She survived, and was found insane. He was indicted for "white slavery". His professional bio from Who's Who in new York, 1914: www.ebooksread.com/authors-eng/geddings-harry-crawford/wh...
